resources.string: 1) Time limit for the test is 5 minutes.
2) An exam is a race against time, try to be quick, but careful.
3) There are total 10 Question in the test.
4) you can solve any number of question.
5) For correct answer and you will get 1 marks.
7) For NotAttempted Question you will get 0 marks.
